thread.title: Guidebook bolsters UK team following significant business growth
thread.title_full: Guidebook bolsters UK team following significant business growth

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Guidebook bolsters UK team following significant business growth
text:
Guidebook bolsters UK team following significant business growth Guidebook bolsters UK team following significant business growth Details Category: Appointments   10:00 Event app specialist Guidebook today announces the appointment of five new team members to newly created roles at its UK office, following continued growth in the EMEA region. Liz Lewis joins the Guidebook team as UK Marketing Manager, having previously worked in customer insight and lead generation at communication technology firm Sabio. Patrick Tettmar and Stewart Price join Guidebook as Customer Success Associates, bringing a combined wealth of account management experience. 
Paul Jameson has been appointed as Sales Executive, with over eight years of experience in account management and sales, while Henry Harbour takes up the role of Guidebook’s first EMEA Sales Development Representative. Wayne Morris, General Manager of EMEA at Guidebook, comments: “We opened our UK office a little over 12 months ago and have since seen a rapid growth in business from the EMEA region. We’re passionate about making elegant and feature rich event apps open to all and it seems this resonates with event planners in this region. “I’m excited to start working with the new team members as we look to continue growing. They all bring extremely valuable skill sets to our team, and fit perfectly into the culture of collaboration we foster at Guidebook. I’m very excited to see them take Guidebook to yet another level.” Related articles
